items.title: Tesla’s stock fell 8% after its poor Q2 report, but the ‘Musk Magic’ premium is still sky-high

items.title: Satya Nadella on the ‘enigma of success’ in the age of AI: A thriving business, but 15,000+ layoffs
items.description: Microsoft is spending $80 billion on AI initiatives in 2025, and CEO Satya Nadella says headcount is “relatively unchanged” even despite mass layoffs.
